com.atakmap.android.cot

Interface MarkerDetailHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContactListDetailHandler, MedicalDetailHandler, OpaqueHandler, TargetMunitionsDetailHandler, UIDHandler

    public interface MarkerDetailHandler
    Responsible for implementing any marker to detail conversions. It's recommended to use CotDetailHandler instead, which contains extra functionality and is compatible with all map items instead of just markers

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void toCotDetail(Marker marker, CotDetail detail)
      Given a marker and an CotDetail (usually empty), fill the detail as appropriate from entries in the Marker Detail.
      void toMarkerMetadata(Marker marker, CotEvent event, CotDetail detail)
      Given a CotEvent and CotDetails create the appropriate entries in a Marker.

    • Method Detail

      • toMarkerMetadata

        void toMarkerMetadata(Marker marker,
                      CotEvent event,
                      CotDetail detail)
        Given a CotEvent and CotDetails create the appropriate entries in a Marker.

      • toCotDetail

        void toCotDetail(Marker marker,
                 CotDetail detail)
        Given a marker and an CotDetail (usually empty), fill the detail as appropriate from entries in the Marker Detail.
